verses.verse: וַיַּ֣רְא <WH7200> vai-Yar saw יַעֲקֹ֔ב <WH3290> ya-'a-Ko, Now when Jacob כִּ֥י <WH3588> ki that יֶשׁ־ <WH3426> yesh- that there was שֶׁ֖בֶר <WH7668> She-ver corn בְּמִצְרָ֑יִם <WH4714> be-mitz-Ra-yim; in Egypt וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <WH559> vai-Yo-mer said יַעֲקֹב֙ <WH3290> ya-'a-Ko Jacob לְבָנָ֔יו <WH1121> le-va-Nav, unto his sons לָ֖מָּה <WH4100> Lam-mah Why תִּתְרָאֽוּ׃ <WH7200> tit-ra-'U. Why do ye look

וַיֹּ֕אמֶר <WH559> vai-Yo-mer And he said הִנֵּ֣ה <WH2009> hin-Neh Behold שָׁמַ֔עְתִּי <WH8085> sha-Ma'-ti, Behold I have heard כִּ֥י <WH3588> ki that יֶשׁ־ <WH3426> yesh- that there is שֶׁ֖בֶר <WH7668> She-ver corn בְּמִצְרָ֑יִם <WH4714> be-mitz-Ra-yim; in Egypt רְדוּ־ <WH3381> re-du- get you down שָׁ֙מָּה֙ <WH8033> Sham-mah there וְשִׁבְרוּ־ <WH7666> ve-shiv-ru- thither and buy לָ֣נוּ La-nu מִשָּׁ֔ם <WH8033> mish-Sham, place וְנִחְיֶ֖ה <WH2421> ve-nich-Yeh for us from thence that we may live וְלֹ֥א <WH3808> ve-Lo and not נָמֽוּת׃ <WH4191> na-Mut. and not die

וַיֵּרְד֥וּ <WH3381> vai-ye-re-Du went down אֲחֵֽי־ <WH251> 'a-chei- brethren יוֹסֵ֖ף <WH3130> yo-Sef And Joseph's עֲשָׂרָ֑ה <WH6235> 'a-sa-Rah; ten לִשְׁבֹּ֥ר <WH7666> lish-Bor to buy בָּ֖ר <WH1250> bar corn מִמִּצְרָֽיִם׃ <WH4714> mi-mitz-Ra-yim. in Egypt

וְאֶת־ <WH853> ve-'Et בִּנְיָמִין֙ <WH1144> bin-ya-Min But Benjamin אֲחִ֣י <WH251> 'a-Chi brother יוֹסֵ֔ף <WH3130> yo-Sef, Joseph's לֹא־ <WH3808> lo- did not שָׁלַ֥ח <WH7971> sha-Lach sent יַעֲקֹ֖ב <WH3290> ya-'a-Ko Jacob אֶת־ <WH854> 'et- with אֶחָ֑יו <WH251> 'e-Chav; not with his brethren כִּ֣י <WH3588> ki for אָמַ֔ר <WH559> 'a-Mar, for he said פֶּן־ <WH6435> pen- Lest peradventure יִקְרָאֶ֖נּוּ <WH7122> yik-ra-'En-nu befall him אָסֽוֹן׃ <WH611> a-Son. mischief

וַיָּבֹ֙אוּ֙ <WH935> vai-ya-Vo-'u came בְּנֵ֣י <WH1121> be-Nei And the sons יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <WH3478> Yis-ra-'El, of Israel לִשְׁבֹּ֖ר <WH7666> lish-Bor to buy בְּת֣וֹךְ <WH8432> be-Toch [corn] among הַבָּאִ֑ים <WH935> hab-ba-'Im; those that came כִּֽי־ <WH3588> ki- for הָיָ֥ה <WH1961> ha-Yah become הָרָעָ֖ב <WH7458> ha-ra-'Av for the famine בְּאֶ֥רֶץ <WH776> be-'E-retz was in the land כְּנָֽעַן׃ <WH3667> ke-Na-'an. of Canaan

וְיוֹסֵ֗ף <WH3130> ve-yo-Sef, And Joseph ה֚וּא <WH1931> hu he הַשַּׁלִּ֣יט <WH7989> hash-shal-Lit [was] the governor עַל־ <WH5921> 'al- over הָאָ֔רֶץ <WH776> ha-'A-retz, over the land ה֥וּא <WH1931> hu who הַמַּשְׁבִּ֖יר <WH7666> ham-mash-Bir [and] he [it was] that sold לְכָל־ <WH3605> le-chol to all עַ֣ם <WH5971> 'am to all the people הָאָ֑רֶץ <WH776> ha-'A-retz; of the land וַיָּבֹ֙אוּ֙ <WH935> vai-ya-Vo-'u came אֲחֵ֣י <WH251> 'a-Chei brethren יוֹסֵ֔ף <WH3130> yo-Sef, and Joseph's וַיִּשְׁתַּֽחֲווּ־ <WH7812> vai-yish-ta-cha-vu- and bowed down ל֥וֹ lo אַפַּ֖יִם <WH639> 'ap-Pa-yim themselves before him [with] their faces אָֽרְצָה׃ <WH776> 'A-re-tzah. to the earth
